    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>3177</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Parallel circuit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Paralleler Stromkreis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Circuit parallèle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Circuito paralelo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Circuito parallelo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παράλληλο κύκλωμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Circuito paralelo</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration show you a parallel circuit. Try to guess the total current. Do you get it right?</string>
          </description>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Abbildung Erscheinen Sie ein paralleler 
Stromkreis. Versuchen Sie, den Gesamtstrom zu schätzen. 
Erhalten Sie ihn recht?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette exposition d'illustration vous un circuit 
parallèle. Essayez de deviner tout le courant. 
L'obtenez-vous droit ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta mostra da ilustração você um circuito 
paralelo. Tente supo a corrente total. Você começa-a 
direita?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa esposizione dell'illustrazione voi un 
circuito parallelo. Provi ad indovinare la corrente totale. 
La ottenete di destra?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση σας εμφανίζει παράλληλο κύκλωμα. 
Προσπαθήστε να υποθέσετε το συνολικό ρεύμα. Το 
παίρνετε σωστό;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta demostración de la ilustración usted un 
circuito paralelo. Intente conjeturar la corriente total. 
¿Usted la consigue derecha?</string>
          </description>
        </general>
